name: Breakout ft. Jasper Johns
description:
A three-week project, with the task to make a version of the classic breakout game, but inspired by an artist. This game is based on the artworks of Jasper Johns.

There are two versions available, a short one for those who simply want to see what the game is about, and a really long one, for those who are up for a bit of a challenge.

:)
